headline: Here’s Why Match Group Inc. (MTCH) Is Among The Stocks Targeted By Activist Hedge Funds
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 15 Stocks Targeted By Activist Hedge Funds. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Match Group Inc. (NASDAQ:MTCH) stands against the other stocks targeted by activist hedge funds. Shareholder activism continued at a record pace in 2024 as activist hedge funds pushed for strategic […]

headline: Investors in Match Group, Inc. Should Contact Levi & Korsinsky Before January 24, 2025 to Discuss Your Rights - MTCH
summary: NEW YORK, Jan. 3, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Levi & Korsinsky, LLP notifies investors in Match Group, Inc. of a class action securities lawsuit. ...
